transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning, sir. Ji sir.
Executive: Ji, Aalok baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se. Yes sir. Ji sir, kya kehna hai sir, subscription ke bare mein?
Customer: Bas, main kehta hu maximizer ke maine detail bheji hai abhi aapko, theek hai? Ji ji ji. Actual price jo hai iska teen saal ka sir ₹1.5 lakh plus GST hai, theek hai? Uske baad jo hai wo discount karke jo bheja hai wo ₹1,30,000 plus GST ka bheja hai aapko.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai? Iske andar ek to hum log aapke website rahegi. Website in the sense kya hai ki showroom.indiamart.com karke aap open karenge.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To waha pe na aapko templates ke link milenge. To jo bhi templates aap final karenge to usme hum log aapki website design karke denge sir. Ji ji. Theek hai? Template matlab?
Executive: Template in the sense ki ek tarike se website ka design rehta hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai? Abhi kya hai ki normal aapka jaise basic service mein kya hai ki mini dynamic catalog mein aapka ek black and white catalog bana rehta hai sir. Ji ji, theek hai? To yaha pe to itna jyada kuch attractive website nahi rehti par maximizer mein hum log kya hai ki colors ko templates dete hai sir. Ji ji. To waha pe yehi wale product aapke dalenge to ek achcha impression aayega sir. Kyunki aapka product kaisa hai, product kaisi line hai ki kahin na kahin usme website pe ek achche tarike se agar jo representation hogi to kahin na kahin customer ke samne ek achcha impression aata hai sir. Ji ji. Us tarike se. Ji. Theek hai? To ek website aapki ban jayegi sir iske andar, theek hai? Char corporate email ID hum log denge on domain ki. Domain in the sense ki jo bhi hum log aapka book karenge naturalnasimmarble.com ya .co.in jo bhi aap lena chahenge. Ji ji ji. Theek hai? Usi domain ke char corporate email ID aapko mil jayegi. Sir aap apne naam pe account sales karke is tarike se sare email ID create kar sakte hain. Ji ji ji. Theek hai? Baki isme weekly bylead jo rahegi aapki 30 weekly bylead rahegi aur do bylead as a bonus bylead rahegi. To total 44. Pehle to sir 64 milti thi.
Executive: Maximizer mein 64 kaha milti thi sir? Pehle kitni milti thi? 42. Sorry. Nahi nahi nahi sir, itni hi milti thi sir. Kitni milti thi? Yani ki 30 bylead weekly rehti hai aur do-do bylead as a bonus bylead rehte hai. To 2 into 7 ho gaye 14 aur 30 ye ho gaye to total 44 hi bylead milegi sir isme only maximizer mein. Ji ji ji, maximizer mein. Koi nahi wo to wo purane wale hi hai jaise pehle milta tha waise milta tha. Ha, jaise maximizer pehle maximizer chalaya hai isse pehle aapne? Ji ji ji.
Executive: Okay. Maximizer jo hai, ek minute. Ye maximizer aur TrustSeal dono hi hai na sir?
Customer: Ha, maximizer aapne chalaya to hai 2000 February mein 2024 se leke 2025 tak. Ji ji ji. Ha, tab chalaya hai maximizer to wohi same maximizer hai sir ye. Ji ji. Waha pe naturalnasimmarble.com karke aapka domain tha. Ji ji. Ek bar main check kar leta hu. Ha, ye wala abhi domain available hoga to isi wale domain ke sath hum log isko. Nahi ye hai abhi. To hai. Halaki maine do team se hi banaya hai. To website meri bani hui hai jo alag se. Ye wala domain aapne kisi website ke sath host kara rakha hai kya ye wala domain? Nahi nahi nahi karwaya abhi tak. Nahi karwaya na? Free hai na? Ji. Kyunki wohi wohi main puch raha hu kyunki agar jo hosting ho jati hai na kisi dusri website pe kyunki ek domain jo hai na ek website pe hi chalta hai sir. Ji ji ji. To wo dusri website pe run nahi karta to fir nahi to fir wo jo hai wo waha se free karwana padega. Ji ji. Theek hai? Koi nahi aap ye le lijiye. Aur ispe kuch condition wagera kuch aur hai ya yehi hai?
Executive: Sir, nahi nahi sir aur koi condition nahi. Jo cheeze thi wo maine abhi aapko clear kar hi di hai sir, theek hai? Maximizer ke jo jo benefits the, jo jo price wagera wo sara cheeze maine aapko clear kar diya hai, theek hai? Ab aap agree hai is terms and condition pe to fir main jo hai isko star wali service ko download karne ke liye process karwa deta hu sir, theek hai? Ji ji. Aaj ke kal mein ek do din ke andar hi isko hum log download kar denge. To download karenge to fir waha se account pe hamare paas aa jayega ki bhai itna paisa hum log adjust kar payenge sir. To jo fees plus GST ki maine aapko deal di hai to usme fir aapko usi hisab se aapka paisa usme se less ho jayega, theek hai? Wo ek bar main team se confirm kar lunga ki wo kis calculation ke hisab se kar payenge sir isko, theek hai? Ji ji. Aap dekh lena kitna paisa nikal raha hai, kya nikal raha hai wo bata dena. Ha, kyunki main tabhi to keh raha hu na sir ki aap allow karenge ki ha ki bhai meri service ko download kar do aap ye jo star service ko to usi ke bihaf pe main karwaunga. Aur ye jo hai tickets aapke aa rakhe hai ye mujhe band karne padenge uske bihaf pe fir wo usko hoga. Baki maine aapko on the call recording line pe aapko confirm kar hi diya hai ki bhai hum log isko kar rahe hai abhi aapka process jo hai maximizer ke liye, theek hai? Ji ji ji, ji ji. Theek hai na? Okay hai na? Abhi to aur koi dikkat nahi hai na sir? Nahi nahi nahi. Theek hai? To main karwa ke jo hai na main aapko details jo hai jaise wo download hoga aur account ki side se hamare paas aa jayega na confirmation ki bhai ye paisa aapka nikal raha hai us hisab se to fir main aapko ek bar dobara call karke jo hai main aapko bata dunga ki sir ye itna aapka amount hum log adjust kar rahe hai. Kyunki usse pehle jo hai wo karunga to fir main aapka performa bhi approve karaunga wo maximizer ke through. Ji ji ji. Aur wo aap WhatsApp pe detail bhej dena sir jo samajh mein thoda. Nahi nahi sir main main ha bilkul sir aapse sari cheeze confirm karke tabhi karenge sir process. Aisa nahi hai ki bhai apni marzi se koi kuch nahi hai sir, theek hai? Nahi nahi wo to mere ko pata hai jabhi to main IndiaMART pe wapas juda hu nahi to koi baat nahi. Bilkul bilkul. Us cheez ke liye aap trust rakhiye sir aapne itna paisa trust rakha hai sari cheeze aapne unki hai. Ji ji. Is tarike se aapko problem nahi aayegi. Ji ji ji. Baki main isko update karke abhi aapka ticket ka closure aayega usko aap okay kar dena. Abhi no feedback mat dena sir please, theek hai? Ji ji. Aapke account se hum log change kar rahe hai to usko. Theek hai ji okay ji. Main karke bhej dunga abhi aapko. Ji ji, ji ji. Ji. Theek hai. Okay sir. Thank you, thank you sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says he used to get 64 buyleads.

- Customer wants details on WhatsApp.



Resolution:

- Executive explained maximizer benefits and pricing.

- Executive confirmed website design and corporate email IDs.

- Executive confirmed 30 weekly buyleads and 2 bonus buyleads.

- Executive will process download of star service.

- Executive will confirm the adjusted amount after download.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, maximizer, website, domain
